com.siperian.sif.message

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.Parameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Field

    public class Parameter
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Strongly typed data value.

    The type of data can be specified by calling the appropriate constructor or be set explicitly by calling one of the setter methods.

    See field summary for list of possible data types.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setBigIntegerValue

        public void setBigIntegerValue(BigDecimal bigDecimalValue)
        Sets the BigInteger value from the long value of a BigDecimal.

        Supports databases that return integers as decimals.

        Parameters:
        bigDecimalValue - long value of the BigDecimal value will be used.

      • getBigDecimalValue

      • getValue

        public Object getValue()
        Returns:
        Object representing the value; the actual class of the Object is based on the data type of the value as specified by the constructor or one of the setter methods. null if no value set.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(Object value)
        Sets the value of the Parameter based on the class instance of the Object type.
        Parameters:
        value - Value of type BigInteger, BigDecimal, Date, Boolean, or String. If the object is not one of those types, the method uses the Object's toString method to obtain a String value.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(Object value,
                     String dataType)
        Sets the value of the Parameter to the specified data type regardless of Object value type.
        Parameters:
        value - Value of type BigInteger, BigDecimal, Date, Boolean, or String. If the object is not one of those types, the method uses the Object's toString method to obtain a String value. null value will be left as null.
        dataType - Parameter data type; see field summary for list of possible data types.
